info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used to manage the network function deployment in a hybrid network resource provider.

delete.description: Deletes the specified hybrid network network function resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkFunctionName
parameters.description: The name of the hybrid network network function.

202.description: Accepted. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header pointing to an operations resource. The operation URI can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource with the specified name does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified hybrid network network function resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkFunctionName
parameters.description: The name of the hybrid network network function resource.

200.description: Operation is successful. The operation returns the resulting hybrid network network function resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a hybrid network network function resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkFunctionName
parameters.description: Resource name for the hybrid network network function resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied in the body to the create or update hybrid network network function operation.

201.description: Created or Updated. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header pointing to an operation resource. The operation URI can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the tags for the hybrid network network function resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkFunctionName
parameters.description: Resource name for the network function resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the update hybrid network network function tags operation.

200.description: Update is completed successfully. The operation returns the resulting hybrid network network function resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the hybrid network network functions in a subscription.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of hybrid network network function resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the hybrid network network function resources in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of hybrid network network function resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

NetworkFunction.description: Hybrid network network function resource response.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the hybrid network network function resource.

device.description: The reference to the hybrid network device.

skuName.description: The sku name for the hybrid network network function.

skuType.description: The sku type for the hybrid network network function.

vendorName.description: The vendor name for the hybrid network network function.

serviceKey.description: The service key for the network function resource.

vendorProvisioningState.description: The vendor provisioning state for the network function resource.

managedApplication.description: The resource URI of the managed application.

managedApplicationParameters.description: The parameters for the managed application.

networkFunctionUserConfigurations.description: The network function configurations from the user.

value.description: A list of hybrid network network function resources in a subscription or resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkFunctionListResult.description: Response for hybrid network network function API service call.

roleName.description: The name of the network function role.

userDataParameters.description: The user data parameters from the customer.
